definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: swell (?; so Thes; inferred fr. deriv.; Ar. 9afalun is a tumour in the vulva or anus, 9afila appar. denom. (cf. II. [[עׂפֶל]]) v. As. uplu, prob. tumour (Dl:HWB 7 ublu, but v. Jen:Th Lz 1895, 250));—

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 fs. [[עֻפְּלָה]] Hb Hab 2:4 acc. to MT (subj. [[נַפְשׁוֹ]], cf. GASm); but subst. needed, Brd:SK 1889, 121 [[הַנֶּעֱלָף]], We Now [[הָעַוׇּל]], cf. Gu:Kau.—
